title: Address details
cannotFindAddress: I cannot find the address in the list
pageText: You should be able to find the address on your payslips, contract or other official documents.
insetText: This should be the same respondent address given to Acas.
manualAddress: The respondent address is outside the UK

addressPostcode.invalid: Enter a valid postcode. For example, SW1 1AA
addressPostcode.required: Enter a postcode. For example, SW1 1AA

respondentAddress1.required: Enter the first line of the respondent address - up to 100 characters
respondentAddress1.invalid: Enter a valid first line of the respondent address - up to 100 characters

respondentAddressTown.required: Enter a town or city for the respondent address - up to 60 characters
respondentAddressTown.invalid: Enter a valid town or city for the respondent address - up to 60 characters

respondentAddressCountry.required: Enter a country for the respondent address - up to 60 characters
respondentAddressCountry.invalid: Enter a valid country for the respondent address - up to 60 characters

respondentAddressPostcode.required: Enter a postcode or zip code
